books.author: by Neil deGrasse Tyson
books.description: A straightforward, easy-to-understand introduction to the laws that govern the universe.
books.name: ASTROPHYSICS FOR PEOPLE IN A HURRY

books.author: by Sheryl Sandberg and Adam Grant
books.description: Sandberg’s experience after her husband’s sudden death and Grant’s psychological research combine to provide insight on facing adversity and building resilience.
books.name: OPTION B

books.author: by Timothy Snyder
books.description: Twenty lessons from the 20th century about the course of tyranny.
books.name: ON TYRANNY

books.author: by Ben Sasse
books.description: The Nebraska senator’s advice on how to raise resilient, responsible children.
books.name: THE VANISHING AMERICAN ADULT

books.author: by J.D. Vance
books.description: A Yale Law School graduate looks at the struggles of the white working class through the story of his own childhood.
books.name: HILLBILLY ELEGY

books.author: by David Grann
books.description: The story of a murder spree in 1920s Oklahoma that targeted Osage Indians, whose lands contained oil.
books.name: KILLERS OF THE FLOWER MOON

books.author: by Jonathan Allen and Amie Parnes
books.description: An examination of Hillary Clinton’s presidential campaign.
books.name: SHATTERED

books.author: by Diane Ackerman
books.description: How a Warsaw couple sheltered Jews and members of the Resistance during World War II. Originally published in 2007; now the basis of a movie,
books.name: THE ZOOKEEPER’S WIFE

books.author: by David Ortiz with Michael Holley
books.description: Looking back on 14 years with the Red Sox.
books.name: PAPI

books.author: by Steven Pinker
books.description: The Harvard psychologist argues that we are living in the most peaceable period of human existence, thanks to developments ­— government, literacy, trade — that make it possible for people to control their violent impulses.
books.name: THE BETTER ANGELS OF OUR NATURE

books.author: by Condoleezza Rice
books.description: The former secretary of state argues that the promotion of democracy should shape America’s foreign policy.
books.name: DEMOCRACY

books.author: by Robert O'Neill
books.description: The 400-mission career of a SEAL Team operator.
books.name: THE OPERATOR

books.author: by Harold Evans
books.description: Advice on writing well from a noted editor.
books.name: DO I MAKE MYSELF CLEAR?

books.author: by Margot Lee Shetterly
books.description: The story of the black women mathematicians at then-segregated NASA and its precursor. The basis of the movie.
books.name: HIDDEN FIGURES

books.author: by Kareem Abdul-Jabbar
books.description: A life-changing 50-year friendship that began during Abdul-Jabbar’s student days at U.C.L.A.
books.name: COACH WOODEN AND ME
